subject: All Star Games
Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: It was only dugout chatter. But if Scott Kazmir had had to throw any more pitches, the rookie third baseman Evan Longoria said he could have replaced him.
snippet: It was only dugout chatter. But if Scott Kazmir had had to throw any more pitches, the rookie third baseman Evan Longoria said he could have replaced him.
